description.english: Kill the wasteland dweller by opening the cage floor
description.german: Töte den Einsiedler indem du den Deckel seines Käfigs öffnest
description.french: Tuez l'ermite en ouvrant le couvercle de sa cage
description.italian: Uccidi l'eremita aprendo la porta della sua gabbia

description.russian: Убей отшельника, открыв крышку его клетки
description.portuguese: Mata o morador do deserto ao abrir a sua jaula
description.polish: Zabij pustelnika otwierając wieko od jego klatki

description.brazilian: Mate o morador do deserto abrindo a jaula dele

description.czech: Zachraň svého spoluvězně chyceného v kleci

description.english: Fully release the spikes in the torture device
